Text.Language: Tenouwst m~Viwt n~te piouwini: nem Pefs/ri m~monogen/c: nem Pip~neuma m~parakl/ton: }t~riac n~o~mooucioc.
We worship the Father of Light, and His only-begotten Son, and the Spirit, the Paraclete; the Trinity, one in essence.

Comment.Language: The deacons then continue with the following:
